meanings.sent1: Her unorthodoxies in fashion always turned heads.
meanings.sent2: His unorthodoxies in cooking led to unique and delicious dishes.
meanings.sent3: The group's unorthodoxies in team-building exercises made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His unorthodoxies in problem-solving were like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The artist's unorthodoxies in painting left a lasting impression on viewers.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unorthodox
meanings.sent1: The unorthodoxies of her personality made her stand out.
meanings.sent2: The unorthodoxies of his approach to work were both refreshing and effective.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show highlighted the unorthodoxies of everyday life in a humorous way.
meanings.sent4: The unorthodoxies of the situation were like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The book beautifully captured the unorthodoxies of human nature.
